name: es-module-lexer
description: Lexes ES modules returning their import/export metadata

scripts.build: node --experimental-modules build.js && babel dist/lexer.js | terser -o dist/lexer.cjs
scripts.footprint: npm run build && cat dist/lexer.js | gzip -9f | wc -c
